infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a spare room. Let's see what's in here.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You arrive in a workshop. An ordinary kind of place. You begin to take stock of what's here.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You've entered a basement.



There is an unblocked exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: laundry place
infos.desc:
You arrive in a laundry place. A normal one.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
Guess what, you are in a place we're calling a chamber. You start to take note of what's in the room.



There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
I am sorry to announce that you are now in the kitchen.



There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

objective: Welcome to TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First thing I need you to do is to attempt to go to the south. And then, make an attempt to travel west. That done, try to go to the north. Then, make an effort to venture east. With that over with, try to head north. And then, lift the coin from the floor of the kitchen. Once that's all handled, you can stop!
